projects.name: KXTileView
projects.description: A open-source library for creating tiled views with built-in animations for iPad. It features a flexible API, dynamic layout, customizable styles and dimensions, supports landscape mode and can be used to build fluid tile layouts in an iPad app.

projects.name: LinkedIn iPhone Calendar
projects.description: I built the entire client-side implementation of LinkedIn's iPhone calendar. Featured on the LinkedIn app home screen, the calendar allows the user to gather pre-meeting intelligence on who they will be meeting with throughout the day. Notable features include two-way infinite scrolling and dynamic table cell layouts.

projects.name: Hacker News 7
projects.description: A simple mobile client for browsing the YCombinator site Hacker News. The app features a polished UI and dark and light themes. Unfortunately project is no longer maintained.
